description: The product in display is Horn Anvil has one flat tapered horn and one round tapered horn, is perfect for forming, flattening, shaping and riveting, has a hole on top for riveting. Horn Anvil is made of forged steel, machined and case hardened and a high polished finish. Anvil can be used Jewelers, Bead and Wire Working, Watchmakers and Metal-Smiting work. Horn Anvil has round and flat horns are smooth all around. Anvil can be turn upside down and used for forming round forms and shapes. Pack of 1 Piece Horn Anvil
